"A.P.238/4/7": "ARKS's event... Oh, the one on the monitor earlier? I'm not interested."
"The only thing that interests me... is how to become stronger and eliminate the Darkers."
"...ダークファルスだって歯牙にもかけないほどの力があればぼくにそれだけの力があれば..."
"...彼女は、死なずに済んだんだ。"
"...Tell me. Why did she have to die?"
"Why, why her... Even though she wasn't talented, she tried her best every single day..."
"Her dream was finally coming true, and then..."
"If I wipe out the Darkers, that'll be the end of it for sure."
"Yeah, I knew it all along. That's all I can do, so that's what I should do."
"Well, I'll get going. Everyone's taking part in the event, while there's so many more to eliminate..."
